description: Try our easy to follow Egg, Tzatziki & Spinach Wrap + Snacks recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Kids wrap,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Healthier Easier,Low sugar,Back to school,Sesame free,Halal,High protein,High fibre,Vegetarian,Tomato,Spinach,Peanut free
name: Egg, Tzatziki & Spinach Wrap + Snacks Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 Woolworths free range eggs, hard boiled, peeled

recipeInstructions.text: Mash eggs and tzatziki in a bowl. Spread egg mixture over wrap, leaving a 1cm border. Place spinach and carrot in centre of wrap. Tightly roll wrap to enclose filling. Pack next to frozen drink or cool brick in lunch box to keep cool.
Snack 1: Pack cheese and tomato in an airtight container.
Snack 2: Pack pear in lunchbox and popcorn in an airtight container.
